column1: "Hi, my name is Dave Navarro. I'm your tour guide for today. My pronouns are he and him, and I'm from India. I'd like to introduce you to a northeastern Californian community, show you features of student life here in the Bay area, and tell you about what this college offers to our excellent students. Let's start. Before we begin, please remember to use the restroom now, as restroom breaks will not be provided throughout the tour. Northeastern University Oakland was formed through a merger between Northeastern University and Mills College. Mills College was founded in 1852 in Benicia, California, and then shifted to Oakland in 1871. Northeastern also houses an experiential learning program that allows"
